original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o // nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is present without grasping and without attachment.🔽Inner emptiness is present without grasping and without attachment.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: Outer emptiness is present without grasping and without attachment.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa me dpar nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa me dpar nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is present without grasping and without attachment.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is present without grasping and without attachment.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: Great emptiness is present without grasping and without attachment.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nya bar gnas pa'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nya bar gnas pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to abide in the emptiness of the ultimate without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena without grasping and without attachment.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to abide in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena without grasping and without attachment.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to abide in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of what is neither unconditioned nor not unconditioned without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of what is originally unborn without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of what is unceasing without grasping and without attachment.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to abide in the emptiness of essence without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of all phenomena without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of defining characteristics without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of anything to be grasped without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of an agent without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a reference point without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a basis without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a foundation without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a support without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a point of reference without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a basis for the point of reference without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a basis for the point of reference without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a basis for the point of reference without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a basis for the point of reference without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a basis for the point of reference without grasping and without attachment.

original: @241a *// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: @241a *// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a basis for the point of reference without grasping and without attachment.🔽It is to abide in the emptiness of the absence of a basis for

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to be present without grasping and without attachment to the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to be present without grasping and without attachment to the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to be present without grasping and without attachment to the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to be present without grasping and without attachment to the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽It is to be present without grasping and without attachment to the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to be present without grasping and without attachment to the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: He is present without grasping and without attachment to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: He is present without grasping and without attachment to the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par @241b chags pa med phar nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par @241b chags pa med phar nye bar gnas pa'o // dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: He is present without grasping and without attachment to the right efforts.🔽He is present without grasping and without attachment to the legs of miraculous power.🔽He is present without grasping and without attachment to the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: He is present without grasping and without attachment to the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The limbs of awakening are present without grasping and without attachment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is present without grasping and without attachment.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The truths of the noble ones are present without grasping and without attachment.

original: bsam gtan rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The meditative concentrations are present without grasping and without attachment.

original: tshad med pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The immeasurables are present without grasping and without attachment.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The formless absorptions are present without grasping and without attachment.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides without grasping and without attachment to the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / @242a *//
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / @242a *//
translated: He abides without grasping and without attachment to the concentrations and formless absorptions.

original: smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides without grasping and without attachment to the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides without grasping and without attachment to the clairvoyances.🔽He abides without grasping and without attachment to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides without grasping and without attachment to the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: They are present without grasping and without attachment to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: They are present without grasping and without attachment to the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: They are present without grasping and without attachment to the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o // byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: They are present without grasping and without attachment to the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They are present without grasping and without attachment to great love.

original: snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: They are present without grasping and without attachment to great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not appropriated and do not settle down on anything;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon @242b bar chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon @242b bar chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: the result of stream enterer is not appropriated and does not settle down on anything;🔽the result of once-returner is not appropriated and does not settle down on anything;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o // dgra bcom pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: the result of non-returner is not appropriated and does not settle down on anything;🔽the state of a worthy one is not appropriated and does not settle down on anything;

original: rang byang chub la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is not appropriated and does not settle down on anything;

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to be present without grasping or attachment to the consciousness of the path.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is to be present without grasping or attachment to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Lord,

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /🔽ji ltar na tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags / ji ltar na tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: how is this perfection of wisdom present without grasping or attachment to form?🔽How is it present without grasping or attachment to feeling?

original: ji ltar na 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it present without grasping or attachment to perception?

original: ji ltar na 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye @243a *//🔽bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye @243a *// bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How does one abide in the absence of grasping and attachment to volitional factors?

original: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How does one abide in the absence of grasping and attachment to consciousness?

original: ji ltar na mig la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rna ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /🔽ji ltar na sna la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mig la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags / ji ltar na rna ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags / ji ltar na sna la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How does one abide in the absence of grasping and attachment to the eyes?🔽How does one abide in the absence of grasping and attachment to the ears?🔽How does one abide in the absence of grasping and attachment to the nose?

original: ji ltar na lce la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lce la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How does one abide in the absence of grasping and attachment to the tongue?

original: ji ltar na lus la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lus la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the body is present without being grasped or attached to?

original: ji ltar na yid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis bar nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na yid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis bar nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the mind is present without being grasped or attached to?

original: ji ltar na gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that form is present without being grasped or attached to?

original: ji ltar na sgra la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /🔽ji ltar na dri la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma @243b mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na sgra la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags / ji ltar na dri la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma @243b mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that sound is present without being grasped or attached to?🔽How is it that smell is present without being grasped or attached to?

original: ji ltar na ro la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na ro la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that taste is present without being grasped or attached to?

original: ji ltar na reg la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na reg la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that contact is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na chos la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /🔽ji ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags / ji ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags / ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that phenomena are present without being grasped and without attachment?🔽How is it that eye consciousness is present without being grasped and without attachment?🔽How is it that ear consciousness is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that nose consciousness is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the tongue consciousness is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the body consciousness is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /🔽ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs @244a *//
analyzed: ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags / ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs @244a *//
translated: How is it that the mind consciousness is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that eye contact is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that ear contact is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis bar nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis bar nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the composite of nose contact is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the composite of tongue contact is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the composite of body contact is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the composite of mental contact is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the feeling conditioned by the composite of eye contact is present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /🔽ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye @244b bar gnas pa lags /

original: ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are present without being grasped and without attachment?

original: ji ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are not appropriated and do not settle down?

original: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the higher knowledges are not appropriated and do not settle down?

original: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: How is it that the meditative stabilizations are not appropriated and do not settle down?

original: ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags /

translated: it is peaceful, subtle, and understandable only to the wise, the discerning, and the well trained.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni /
analyzed: sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni /
translated: those beings who will believe in this deep perfection of wisdom

original: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o //
translated: have served the victors of the past.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni /
analyzed: sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni /
translated: those beings who will believe in this deep perfection of wisdom

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o //
translated: It is to be accepted by a spiritual friend and to plant the roots of virtue.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams @280a *//
analyzed: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams @280a *//
translated: if all the sentient beings in the worlds of the great trichiliocosm

original: kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang /
analyzed: kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang /
translated: were to become followers of faith, followers of the teachings, eighth-level [bodhisattvas], stream-enterers, once-returners, non-returners,

original: dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur te /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur te /
translated: arhats, and pratyekabuddhas,

original: de dag thams cad la ye shes dang spong ba gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos shing /
analyzed: de dag thams cad la ye shes dang spong ba gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos shing /
translated: and if all of their wisdom and abandonment were to be combined, and if that were to be compared to the wisdom and abandonment of a single bodhisattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of phenomena,

original: bsams te gzhal ba dang / brtag pa dang dpyad pa gnyis ni /
analyzed: bsams te gzhal ba dang / brtag pa dang dpyad pa gnyis ni /
translated: the latter would be superior.🔽The wisdom and abandonment of all the arhats and pratyekabuddhas would not equal even a hundredth part of the wisdom and abandonment of a single bodhisattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of phenomena.

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos pa de nyid mchis lags pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos pa de nyid mchis lags pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who has conviction in this profound perfection of wisdom for just one day would be the best of them.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
translated: To the extent that there is knowledge of one who follows faith, and to the extent that there is elimination,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
translated: that is included in the acceptance of the bodhisattva great beings who have attained the acceptance of the nonproduction of dharmas.

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
translated: To the extent that there is knowledge of one who follows reality, and to the extent that there is elimination,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
translated: that is included in the acceptance of the bodhisattva great beings who have attained the acceptance of the nonproduction of dharmas.

original: brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
analyzed: brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
translated: To the extent that there is knowledge of the eighth-lowest stage, and to the extent that there is elimination,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
translated: The acceptance of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas is included in that.

original: @280b rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
analyzed: @280b rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
translated: The wisdom and abandonment of the stream-enterer, to whatever extent they are,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
translated: are included in the acceptance of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
translated: The wisdom and abandonment of the once-returner, to whatever extent they are,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
translated: are included in the acceptance of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
translated: The wisdom and abandonment of the non-returner, to whatever extent they are,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
translated: are included in the acceptance of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
translated: Whatever is the knowledge and abandonment of an arhat,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
translated: that is included in the acceptance of the bodhisattva mahāsattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
translated: Whatever is the knowledge and abandonment of a pratyekabuddha,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so //
translated: that is included in the acceptance of the bodhisattva mahāsattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa ni spong pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa ni spong pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the sons of the gods who had abandoned desire and were enjoying the pleasures of the gods in the form realm:

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / de de bzhin no //
translated: Sons of the gods!🔽It is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
analyzed: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni /
translated: Whatever is the knowledge and abandonment of a follower of faith,
